iwathkala nithi widuhalpathi janapathi langa nithi widuhal shishyayaku lesa siti thama putha්rayage wibhaga katayuthuwalata adalawa aka්ramikatha sidukaleyayi chodana labima nisa agawinisuruwaraya wisin dhurayen iwathwana lesa niyama karunu hitapu nithi widuhalpathi dabliwngi rodrigu mahatha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wisin janadhipathi lekam karyalaye nithi adhyaksha lesa pathkaraganu laba thibe. 2013 desambar 31wanida sita ohu nithi widuhalpathi dhurayen aniwarya niwadu yawunu athara, 2014 janawari 29 wanida ohuta janadhipathiwaraya wisin nawa pathwima di thibe.
menna thawath kammaliyek.
kese wuwada layif and stayil sangarawa pala karana me puwatha thawath madhya kihipayak magin mathabhedayata lakkara atha.
il pura pasaloswaka poya nowambar masa 22 wana da brahaspathinda aparabhaga 12.51 ta labayi. 23 wana da sikurada purwa bhaga 11.08 dakwa poya pawathi.
thawada eeye pawathi dasa prayama isawwen shri lankawata thawath ridi padakkamak dinadimata ajith karunathilaka samathwu wiya.
eya nirmana sahithyayata adala deyak.
